question: Which of the following schemes by the Ministry of Human Resource and Development is intended at tapping the international pool of talented scientists/entrepreneurs to encourage their engagement with the institutes of Higher Education in India?
explanation: Global Initiative of Academic Networks (GIAN) is an initiative by Govt. of India for Higher Education. It is intended to tap the international pool of talented scientists/entrepreneurs with an objective to encourage their engagement with the institutes of Higher Education in India. The GIAN Implementation Committee/ Sectional Committees are responsible for the selection of faculties, scientists and entrepreneurs to be involved with higher education institutions in India.
